name: Drift Velocity 2
description:
This version contains a quick fix for a unavoidable sector 9 crash. Rate the game for the GMTK 2020 Jam.

Blow up hordes of spaceships in this top down shooter with a twist: you literally can't stop moving, and your mouse is the only way to control your ship.

Rotate? Move the mouse.

Move? Click. 

Fire Lasers? Click. 

Launch Missiles? Click.

Full speed ahead? Also click.

Apply to the Coalition of the Federation Alliance for a weapon upgrade, only for them to turn down your application and give you rubbish armor upgrade instead?  (╯°□°)╯︵ ┻━┻. Then click again!

Its that simple. What are you waiting for? A second tutorial?

Window Controls:

Shift + Escape: Close Game

Shift + F: Toggle Full Screen
